name: Koï-Koï
description:
The koï-koï is a two-player japanese card game centered around making pairs and combinations. This project was a school project, the main directive being to create a program centered around IA. The game proposes here 4 incremental levels of IA, and two game modes: a player-vs-IA mode, and an IA-vs-IA mode. The second mode was created to showcase the level difference between the IAs.

I did the entire graphical interface from scratch, and also helped with the construction of the IA, having a good knowledge of the game.

Project completed in 2 months in a team of 5 persons, Feb. 2018 - April 2018, using Unity C# (self-taught at the time). The game is in french.
